text: Gonzalo Jordy Plata Jiménez (born 1 November 2000) is an Ecuadorian footballer who plays as a winger for Portuguese club Sporting CP. ==International goals== {| class="wikitable" :Scores and results list Ecuador's goal tally first. |- !
